price: Seguiremos a los hechiceros, si son ellos los que vencen".
arabic: لَعَلَّنَا نَتَّبِعُ ٱلسَّحَرَةَ إِن كَانُواْ هُمُ ٱلۡغَٰلِبِينَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: laʿallanā nattabiʿu al-saḥarata in kānū humu al-ghālibīna
